attractions.name: Milagro Historic District
attractions.description: Stroll through our beautifully preserved historic district featuring architecture from the late 1800s. Many buildings house ethical businesses that have been community pillars for generations.

attractions.name: Prosperity Park
attractions.description: A 50-acre urban oasis with walking trails, community gardens, and playgrounds. The park is maintained using sustainable practices and employs local youth through fair-wage programs.

attractions.name: Ethical Commerce Museum
attractions.description: Explore the history of ethical business practices and their impact on communities. Interactive exhibits showcase Milagro's commitment to fair trade and worker rights.

attractions.name: Farmers Market & Craft Co-op
attractions.description: Open every Saturday year-round, featuring local organic produce and handmade goods from worker-owned cooperatives and small ethical businesses.

attractions.name: Riverwalk Trail
attractions.description: A scenic 7-mile trail along the Milagro River with beautiful views and access to several ethical cafes and shops along the route.

attractions.name: Community Arts Center
attractions.description: Hosting exhibitions, performances, and workshops with a focus on local artists. The center operates as a non-profit with fair compensation for all artists.

attractions.name: Sustainable Business Hub
attractions.description: A co-working space and incubator exclusively for businesses committed to ethical practices, sustainability, and community benefit.

attractions.name: Heritage Gardens
attractions.description: Beautiful themed gardens showcasing native plants and sustainable gardening practices. The gardens employ individuals from underrepresented communities.
